Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As film morphology plays a critical role in charge transport , the smoother blend film based on PIDT-C12NT that present more favorable morphological features , may effectively reduce charge recombination and traps , and thereby potentially lead to higher J sc and fill factor ( FF ) than the other two polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| the other two polymers |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PIDT-C12NT" and "the other two polymers". These entities are mentioned as materials being compared for their charge transport properties in the context of film morphology.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, only "PIDT-C12NT" is a clear and valid "Material Name" entity. The phrase "the other two polymers" is not sufficiently specific to be considered a material name in this context.
